thread.section_title: FlightNetwork.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightNetwork.com | www.flightnetwork.com
thread.title: Jana Estrevillo-Tupas

author: Jana Estrevillo-Tupas
title: Jana Estrevillo-Tupas
text: It was my first time to book with FlightNetwork. I didn't compute the continental time difference, unfortunately, which resulted in an incorrect return date. After less than 6 hours of realizing this, I called and the agent I spoke with was able to make the change of dates work out for me in an accommodating and seamless fashion. All info were properly explained and all details were quickly ironed out. I love their customer service! I love their company service!
